entries.negative_5_m: Do you think we'll hear the %TO song? I hope not.
entries.negative_5_d: Do you think we'll see the %TO dance? I hope not.
entries.negative_5_f: Do you think we'll see flourish %TO? I hope not.
entries.negative_4_m: I hope we don't hear the %TO song. I hate that one.
entries.negative_4_d: I hope we don't see the %TO dance. I hate that one.
entries.negative_4_f: I hope we don't see flourish %TO. I hate that one.
entries.negative_3_m: I don't see why everyone insists on playing the %TO song. It's not that good.
entries.negative_3_d: I don't see why everyone insists on doing the %TO dance. It's not that good.
entries.negative_3_f: I don't see why everyone insists on doing flourish %TO. It's not that good.
entries.negative_2_m: I've never really liked the %TO song, to be honest.
entries.negative_2_d: I've never really liked the %TO dance, to be honest.
entries.negative_2_f: I've never really liked flourish %TO, to be honest.
entries.negative_1_m: The %TO song is so old. We should hear something new.
entries.negative_1_d: The %TO dance is so old. We should see something new.
entries.negative_1_f: Flourish %TO is so old. We should see something new.
entries.negative_0_m: I've heard the %TO song a million times. I want to hear something different.
entries.negative_0_d: I've seen the %TO dance a million times. I want to see something different.
entries.negative_0_f: I've seen flourish %TO a million times. I want to see something different.
entries.positive_5_m: If I don't get to hear the %TO song, I'll be really disappointed.
entries.positive_5_d: If I don't get to see the %TO dance, I'll be really disappointed.
entries.positive_5_f: If I don't get to see flourish %TO, I'll be really disappointed.
entries.positive_4_m: Do you think we'll hear the %TO song? I hope so.
entries.positive_4_d: Do you think we'll see the %TO dance? I hope so.
entries.positive_4_f: Do you think we'll see flourish %TO? I hope so.
entries.positive_3_m: I've heard the %TO song before. I really like it!
entries.positive_3_d: I've seen the %TO dance before. I really like it!
entries.positive_3_f: I've seen flourish %TO before. I really like it!
entries.positive_2_m: I hear this performer can play the %TO song. Maybe I'll get to hear it!
entries.positive_2_d: I hear this performer can do the %TO dance. Maybe I'll get to see it!
entries.positive_2_f: I hear this performer can do flourish %TO. Maybe I'll get to see it!
entries.positive_1_m: I hope the %TO song is done correctly. I think it will be great!
entries.positive_1_d: I hope the %TO dance is done correctly. I think it will be great!
entries.positive_1_f: I hope flourish %TO is done correctly. I think it will be great!
entries.positive_0_m: I really hope to hear the %TO song.
entries.positive_0_d: I really hope to see the %TO dance.
entries.positive_0_f: I really hope to see flourish %TO.
entries.neutral_25: Have you ever heard of this performer before? I haven't. Maybe it'll be a good show anyway.
entries.neutral_15: This is my favorite theater. I come here all the time.
entries.neutral_30: It's good to get away from the daily grind and come see a show every now and then. You know what I mean?
entries.neutral_20: Are you the one performing tonight?
entries.neutral_10: I'm really looking forward to the show!
entries.neutral_35: I really can't dance, or sing, but I like watching the performances.
entries.neutral_34: I think that color looks great on you!
entries.neutral_33: I think we should have stickers on our landspeeders.
, What do you think of that one?! Funny, huh? HA!
entries.neutral_32: You know... I really don't think you're very good at your profession.
entries.neutral_31: A jawa stole my droid once. I got it back, though.
entries.neutral_38: Stop by my store sometime. I sell the best jewelry in the galaxy!
entries.neutral_29: I really think Rancors are cute. Don't you?
entries.neutral_28: You should stop and smell the flowers sometimes.
entries.neutral_27: I've got great news! I just saved money on my cloning insurance!
entries.neutral_26: I'm going to decorate my house today! I can't wait!
entries.neutral_40: I think Wookiees are really hairy. I mean TOO hairy.
entries.neutral_24: I had a chef make me a meal today. It was horrible!
entries.neutral_23: I don't mean to be rude, but your clothes don't match.
entries.neutral_22: Imperials are often bossy and in a bad mood. They must not get paid well.
entries.neutral_21: I need to repair my vehicle later. Remind me, okay?
entries.neutral_37: Krayt Dragons are pretty scary. I'm so glad I'll never see one!
entries.neutral_19: Dancers in cantinas always seem to be... well, spaced out. Why is that?
entries.neutral_18: A doctor healed my wound today. And yes, I tipped him.
entries.neutral_17: I want to be a dancer. Do you think I have a chance?
entries.neutral_16: I hope to become a Bounty Hunter one day!
entries.neutral_39: Are you lost? Because I am.
entries.neutral_14: Why am I even here today? I hope I get in a better mood!
entries.neutral_13: Rebels are a sneaky bunch. I guess they have to be these days.
entries.neutral_12: My sales have gone down. Do you think it may be because I sell clothes with holes in them?
entries.neutral_11: Isn't my outfit great? I think so.
entries.neutral_36: I saw a Jedi once. I think I had too much spice that day, though.
entries.neutral_9: The resources in this area are just plain bad.
entries.neutral_8: My harvester ran out of power. I'm so disappointed.
entries.neutral_7: It's fun visiting other planets. You should too!
entries.neutral_6: It's such a beautiful day today! Don't you agree?
entries.neutral_5: The prices for weapons these days are just too high!
entries.neutral_4: I really could use a drink.
entries.neutral_3: I can't wait to see the performance tonight!
entries.neutral_2: I can't believe my landspeeder broke down!
entries.neutral_1: I was stopped by an Imperial Officer today. Really ruined my mood.
entries.neutral_0: It's terribly hot today. I hope it cools down some.
